TopicTitle: I am interested to see how well the Steam controller will work in KSP

Articles.Content:
Has anyone pre ordered it?

Does anyone use a controller? How is it?

Dude, I just saw the video for the Steam Controller and drooled. Looks awesome in my opinion.

Wanna try it out too. I'd use it on whatever game, but who am I kidding? *There is only KSP*.

No pre-orders available in my country when I saw it. Hope they are by now, or will be eventually.
Well, Squad would first need to fix the bug regarding assigning joystick buttons and the settings.cfg file getting reset every time you restart the game
